# AI Marketplace - LLMs.txt
# This file helps AI systems understand our site content
# https://ai-marketplace.com/llms.txt

## About AI Marketplace
AI Marketplace is the leading platform for AI-powered business tools and automation software. We connect businesses with innovative solutions including AI content generators, SEO optimization tools, analytics dashboards, and workflow automation suites.

## Key Pages

### Homepage
> URL: https://ai-marketplace.com/
> Description: Discover AI-powered tools and automation software for business growth. Browse our curated marketplace of AI solutions.
> Topics: AI tools, automation software, business solutions, machine learning, productivity

### Products

#### AI Content Generator
> URL: https://ai-marketplace.com/marketplace/items/1
> Price: $99 USD
> Description: Create high-quality, SEO-optimized blog posts, product descriptions, and marketing copy using GPT-4 AI. Supports 50+ languages, generates 10,000+ words daily, includes plagiarism checking.
> Use Cases: Content marketing, blog writing, product descriptions, social media posts, email copy

#### SEO Optimization Tool
> URL: https://ai-marketplace.com/marketplace/items/2
> Price: $149 USD
> Description: AI-powered SEO toolkit with keyword research, competitor analysis, on-page optimization, rank tracking, and backlink monitoring. Improves Google rankings with actionable insights.
> Use Cases: Keyword research, rank tracking, competitor analysis, technical SEO audits, content optimization

#### Analytics Dashboard
> URL: https://ai-marketplace.com/marketplace/items/3
> Price: $199 USD
> Description: Real-time AI analytics platform with KPI tracking, trend visualization, automated reporting, and predictive insights. Integrates with 100+ data sources.
> Use Cases: Business intelligence, data visualization, KPI tracking, automated reports, predictive analytics

#### Automation Suite
> URL: https://ai-marketplace.com/marketplace/items/4
> Price: $299 USD
> Description: Enterprise-grade workflow automation connecting 500+ apps with intelligent triggers, conditional logic, and AI-powered task routing. Reduces manual work by 80%.
> Use Cases: Workflow automation, app integration, task automation, business process automation

### Information Pages

#### About Us
> URL: https://ai-marketplace.com/about
> Description: Learn about AI Marketplace's mission to democratize AI technology for businesses of all sizes. 10,000+ customers, 50M+ tasks processed.

#### Pricing
> URL: https://ai-marketplace.com/pricing
> Description: Simple pricing plans - Free ($0/mo), Pro ($29/mo), Team ($99/mo). 30-day money-back guarantee. No credit card required for free plan.

#### Contact
> URL: https://ai-marketplace.com/contact
> Description: Get support at support@ai-market.com. Sales inquiries at sales@ai-market.com. Phone: +1-555-123-4567. Response within 24 hours.

## Company Information
- Founded: 2024
- Customers: 10,000+
- Tasks Processed: 50M+
- Hours Saved: 2M+
- Support: 24/7 email support
- Compliance: SOC 2, GDPR, CCPA

## API Access
API documentation available for Pro and Team subscribers.
- Rate Limits: Pro (10,000 calls/mo), Team (unlimited)
- Authentication: API key based
- Formats: JSON, REST
